snippet: After the attack on an Egyptian army barracks in the northern Sinai peninsula, near the country’s border with Israel, the militants seized armored vehicles and tried to infiltrate Israel, according to officials.
abstract: Masked gunmen open fire on Egyptian Army checkpoint in the northern Sinai Peninsula, killing 15 soldiers, before seizing at least one armored vehicle in an attempt to infiltrate Israel; gunmen are struck by Israeli Air Force at the border.

byline.original: By KAREEM FAHIM and MAYY EL SHEIKH
byline.contributor: Jodi Rudoren contributed reporting from Jerusalem, and Fares Akram from Gaza.

lead_paragraph: After the attack on an Egyptian army barracks in the northern Sinai peninsula, near the country’s border with Israel, the militants seized armored vehicles and tried to infiltrate Israel, according to officials.

headline.seo: Gunmen Storm Egyptian Base, Killing 15 Soldiers
headline.main: Gunmen Kill 15 and Steal Vehicle in Attack on Egypt Base
headline.print_headline: Gunmen Kill 15 and Steal Vehicle in Attack on Egypt Base

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
